lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: [b]Welcome in![/b] Oh, it's [[name]]. How's it goin'?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Heyy, it's my lil' buddy! Look at you; what's up? Need somethin'?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: There you go; how's that? All set? Need anything else?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Man; gotta get me one of those, too. Guess I could just grab it off the shelf, huh?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: I'll see what I can do with these; go have fun with that coin, or whatever you do.

after Quingee sells a LOT of items.key: after Quingee sells a LOT of items

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Damn, the hell did you get all these? Eh, I'll figure something out. Here; coin.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Back again, huh lil' buddy? Get on up here, whacha need today.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Well, well, if it isn't [[name]]. What can I do for you?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Weather's kinda shit today, isn't it? Too bad, huh. Stay dry out there!

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Rain sounds good on the roof, doesn't it? Just so long as it doesn't leak; gettin' up there's real rough on me.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Fuckin' beautiful out today. Lookin forward to heading for a walk or something after we close up later.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Great day to climb a mountain, am I right? I wouldn't know, actually; just a nice-ass day.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Weather like this makes me drowsy; you the same way? Would much rather the sun.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Another dreary day. Go hit up Piper, tell her to change the weather, will ya?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You look like you don't weigh jackshit; the wind pushing you around much?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: The way the wind howls is real freaky, isn't it? Has a different vibe when it runs through the mountain.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Window panes rattlin' like a goddamn snake today, what a pain in the ass. Hope it clears up soon.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Hey, stay safe out there, lil' buddy. Don't go making me worry about you, you hear?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Huh, where's Tadhana at? Bet she'd fuckin love to see you today.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You holdin' up alright? Winter's a doctor, y'know. Don't tell me you're afraid of doctors, too.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Hey, have you seen Cameron on his bike out there? Can't he give you a ride up? No?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You'd ought to get those guys over at Alfonso's print shop to get a photo of you.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You hungry, lil' buddy? Mimi's around here somewhere, get you somethin' real good to eat today.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: I think I saw Sou earlier--you met him? Real quiet type. Moves around like a little ghost.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: I don't think Sinclair's been in while you're here, huh? If you head up toward Butternut, try not to fall in his hole.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: I bet you 'n Tao would get along great. Neither of you say much. And you've got that--that glint in your eye.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: I bet Acuity would go fuckin' nuts to get a look at you. They're that weird science-y type, and you're too smart.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You're such a lil' thing--you seen Tempi yet? He's, like, ten times your height. Maybe more.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: There's one cop in town--the good one--he seems like he'd help you out. Don't think he goes to the mountain, though.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You met Sun Eater? That's, uh, Nikita's quingee. Guy's got some crazy-lookin' dogs, too.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Y'know, there's a guy in town--Hawke?--that's real into studying the native species. Bet you'd strike his fancy.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: If you see a ghost, there's a--person? Fuck if I know--in a mask that goes around. Spooky. Hear they make weird food.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You need, like, a lil coop or somethin'? Wren, Ava, Sorrel, all them; they do construction down the road.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Guy up in Pistachio, Hollis, he's got chickens--that close enough? You need some friends, lil' buddy?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Your feathers gettin' a little ruffled, lil' buddy? You shou--wait, no, Enoch does haircuts, not feathers.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Shame it's too early in the season; Caspiana sets up a nice lil' stand in town for hot drinks 'n stuff.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You see any ghosts out on that peak? I bet uh, Deko, down in Walnut, would be all ears for it.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Been real windy in the autumn, huh? Man, there's someone in the valley named Wynne Dee--think about 'em every time, now.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: If anyone tries to bait you into an Olive Garden, just mind your lil' beak, alright? Sage is smart.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Hey, you seen the lil' beans I got over by the window? Looks just like you. Cool fella over at the Toy Shop made the machine. ... Huh? What's that lookfor?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Y'know, of all my customers, you still aren't the weirdest? That goes to the horse-thing, Death Machine.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Shame you never got to meet Guillotine, the mayor's quingee. I think Teri ate him last winter, though.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Hey, they found out in the trial you lil' things can understand the ol' language, right? You talk to Maelys?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You need a bed, lil' buddy? Kat's inn has--well, actually, I guess a bird can't rent a room, huh?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Y'know, I bet Nancio's carriages could get you partway up the mountain, right? Do they service birds?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You like kids, lil' buddy? Bee's kids at the daycare would be all over you, I bet.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Saw Cyrus the other day--I was thinkin', a bird would look pretty freaky with a piercing, wouldn't it?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Can birds drink milk? Mallory's dairy farm up the road has the good shit.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You're a kinda--like a peaceful quingee, huh? Should go bask in Tomoko's flowers, bet you'd both like that.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Quingee don't play with toys like dogs, huh? Wonder if Greta has anything for that at the Toystore...

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Don't mind the frog in the corner--no, I don't know anything about it either. I didn't put it here. It's not me.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: If you get stuck, do you get picked up by the fire station crew? Like when a cat gets stuck in a tree? Ha!

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You been to see Pan Qing at her lil shop yet? Bet she's got plenty of good stuff for you, too.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Saw you goin' in and outta Town Hall--I bet Oleander's gettin a reaaaaal kick outta that, huh?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You look pretty cold, lil' buddy. I know, uh, Noah, at the textile shop's got stuff for that.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Someone told me you weird lil things can read. Can you read maps? You seen Wander yet?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: If you don't pick up any food here, might be able to suck up to Rein down at the Bake & Roast.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Weather's been all over lately, huh? Go waddle over to Piper at the Meterology place 'n see what's up.

meeting Quingee for the first time.key: meeting Quingee for the first time

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: What the fuck is this. Are you just walking up to me? Hello? Am I losing my goddamn mind?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Well, shit, it's the bird again. You doin' your best at, uh, bein' a lil' thing? Down there? Huh?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You really come around all the time now, huh? You're one active lil' thing, I'll give you that.

after Quingee makes decent progress up t.key: after Quingee makes decent progress up the mountain

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Heard you've been makin' it pretty far up the peak. Why don't you just fly? Seems silly to me.

after Quingee makes decent progress up t.key: after Quingee makes decent progress up the mountain 2

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Word is that you've been doin' really well with climbing the mountain. How do you do that? It's impressive, but, yeowza.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Did you actually make it all the way up there? That's fuckin nuts. You, uh, find what you were lookin' for up there?

after receiving a gift you like.key: after receiving a gift you like

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Hey, this is fucking great; thanks! I love this.

after receiving a gift you like 2.key: after receiving a gift you like 2

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Damn, for me? Seriously? Hey, that's real nice of you. This is fantastic.

after receiving a gift you don't like.key: after receiving a gift you don't like

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Yeah, uh, thanks for this. Super great. Thanks.

after receiving a gift you don't like 2.key: after receiving a gift you don't like 2

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Uh... Yeah. Sure, lil' buddy. Thanks.

after receiving a gift you're neutral ab.key: after receiving a gift you're neutral about

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Oh, shit, for me? This is nice; thanks, lil' buddy.

after receiving a gift you're neutral ab.key: after receiving a gift you're neutral about 2

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: C'mon, you shouldn't have. Thanks, though; appreciate it!

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: What's it like to be so small, huh? Valley must look even bigger. Mountain must look ridiculous.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Big shipment in this morning; least we're fully stocked, huh? Pain in the ass, but ah well.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Can lil critters like you eat, uh, sherbet? Ice cream? Eh, better safe than sorry, huh.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You been swimming at all, lil' buddy? You're fuckin, eh... sea chickens, right? Freaky.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Sometimes you make me feel a lilttle nutty, talkin' to a bird every time it comes in, y'know.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Anyone gives you issues, lil' buddy, you just point 'em out to me, alright? I got you.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Y'know, I don't think I've ever seen a quingee leave the valley. Kinda afraid to find out. Don't go take the train, alright?

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: You got, like, a little quingee romance goin' on anywhere? ...Wait, yknow what? Don't tell me.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: So, uh, do you talk to any of the other valley animals? My spouse's got a sneether... kinda freaked out by it, though, personally.

lines.name: Bullfrog
lines.text: Man, I could use some lunch. Still tryin' to keep my sugars down, though... you too, I bet, huh?
